txt.en: The bodies of Rohirrim soldiers litter the Fords of Isen.\n\nYou should bury many of the soldiers, for they deserve a better passing than to rot in the footprints of the enemy host.
The Soldiers of the Second Battle
The soldiers who died at the Fords of Isen need burial, but you haven't the strength or time to bury them all.\n\nYou should bury as many soldiers as you can before you tire.
The soldiers who died at the Fords of Isen need burial, but you haven't the strength or time to bury them all.
The bodies of Rohirrim soldiers litter the Fords of Isen.\n\nYou should bury many of the soldiers, for they deserve a better passing than to rot in the footprints of the enemy host.
You have buried enough bodies for now, for sadly there will be many more before the night is through.
